body: @Alteisen Rise next time, think before deciding whether its worth it to embarrass yourself on the internet okay?
@Alteisen Rise  artist are humans too and they need to earn their keep you know?... cant just do all the chapters at once they need to eat. also a lot of people don't even pay for their works.
@Alteisen Rise This is a third party website bro, its just entries taking from other websites. You gotta find the original or may thous raw adult manga websites for the whole thing.
Cant the author just post the whole damn thing at once?It irritates me that they add a chapter once in a while rather than just post the whole thing when it finished
